title: Ajdovščina Stadium
text:
Ajdovščina City Stadium () is a <a href="stadium">stadium</a> in <a href="Ajdov%C5%A1%C4%8Dina">Ajdovščina</a>, Slovenia. It is used mostly for <a href="football%20%28soccer%29">football</a> matches.
The stadium was closed and under construction in the 2009–10 season. After renovation the capacity of the stadium is 1,630 seats. It was reopened on 5 September 2010.
